settings.heading: 1. Data Controller
settings.content: The data controller responsible for your personal data is:

settings.heading: 2. What Personal Data We Collect
settings.content: We collect and process the following categories of personal data:

settings.items: Identity data: Name, billing/shipping address|Contact data: Email address, phone number|Transaction data: Purchase history, payment details (processed securely via our payment provider)|Technical data: IP address, browser type, device information, cookies|Marketing data: Your preferences for receiving marketing communications

settings.heading: 3. Legal Basis for Processing
settings.content: Under the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we process your data based on:

settings.items: Contract performance: To fulfill orders and provide our services|Legal obligation: To comply with accounting and tax laws|Legitimate interest: To improve our services and prevent fraud|Consent: For marketing communications (you can withdraw at any time)

Process and deliver your orders|Send order confirmations, shipping updates, and receipts|Respond to your customer service inquiries|Send marketing communications (only with your consent)|Improve our website and products|Comply with legal obligations

Payment processors: To securely process transactions (e.g., Klarna, Stripe)|Shipping providers: To deliver your orders|IT service providers: For website hosting and maintenance|Authorities: When required by law

settings.content: We do not sell your personal data to third parties. All service providers are bound by data processing agreements in compliance with GDPR.

settings.heading: 6. International Transfers
settings.content: Your data may be transferred to countries outside the EU/EEA. When this occurs, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, such as Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission.

settings.items: Order data: 7 years (Swedish accounting law requirements)|Marketing data: Until you withdraw consent or unsubscribe|Customer service inquiries: 2 years after resolution

settings.heading: 8. Your Rights Under GDPR
settings.content: As an EU resident, you have the following rights:

settings.items: Right of access: Request a copy of your personal data|Right to rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data|Right to erasure: Request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")|Right to restrict processing: Limit how we use your data|Right to data portability: Receive your data in a portable format|Right to object: Object to processing based on legitimate interest|Right to withdraw consent: Withdraw consent at any time for consent-based processing

settings.content: To exercise these rights, contact us at hello@drinkmoby.com.

settings.heading: 9. Cookies
settings.content: Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. These include:

settings.items: Essential cookies: Required for website functionality|Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site|Marketing cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements (with consent)

settings.content: You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings.

settings.heading: 10. Data Security
settings.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data, including encryption, secure servers, and access controls. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

settings.heading: 11. Complaints
settings.content: If you believe we have not handled your data correctly, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the Swedish Authority for Privacy Protection (Integritetsskyddsmyndigheten, IMY):

settings.heading: 12. Contact Us
settings.content: For questions about this Privacy Policy or to exercise your rights, please contact us:

settings.description: Science-backed clarity and strength. Effortless daily creatine for brain, body, and balance.
settings.newsletter_text: Science-backed insights. Product drops. Delivered monthly.
